meanings.definition: To put at risk or in danger.
meanings.sent1: Leaving the door unlocked is perilling our safety.
meanings.sent2: The storm perilling the ship's voyage.
meanings.sent3: Forgetting to bring an umbrella is perilling our dryness.
meanings.sent4: His reckless behavior is perilling his future.
meanings.sent5: The icy road conditions are perilling our journey.

meanings.definition: To expose to harm or loss.
meanings.sent1: Sharing personal information online can be perilling.
meanings.sent2: The faulty wiring perilling the entire building.
meanings.sent3: Eating too much candy is perilling our teeth.
meanings.sent4: Ignoring warning signs is perilling our safety.
meanings.sent5: The unstable foundation is perilling the stability of the house.
